name: gdp_grid
title: Gross Domestic Product
description: Map of total economic activity, including both formal and informal economic activity for ~2006; created from nighttime lights and LandScan population grid.

extract_types_info.sum: total gdp for each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average gdp within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum gdp assigned to a pixel within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum gdp assigned to a pixel within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Ghosh, T., Powell, R.L., Elvidge, C.D., Baugh, K.E., Sutton, P.C., Anderson, S.: Shedding light on the global distribution of economic activity. The Open Geography Journal 3, 148-161 (2010)
extras.sources_name: Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences, University of Colorado
